author: daxian-dbw
body:
PowerShell needs performance tests to track the perf improvement and regression in long term.
The perf tests will roughly fall in two categories:
- Individual cmdlets, such as those work closely with `PSObject`: `ConvertFrom/To-Csv`, `ConvertFrom/To-Json`; the `*-Object` cmdlets; the `Select-String` and etc.
- scenarios that exercise particular components of the engine, such as the parameter binder (pipeline binding especially), compiler/binder/interpreter, etc.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: .Net Core team moved all benchmark tests in separate repo. We need to consider the experience.

title: Add performance tests to track the perf improvement/regression in long term
